content.query:
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS [dbo].[vw_MarkValueInfo];
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_MarkValueInfo]
AS
SELECT 
	[RefId] AS [MarkInfoKey]
	, [SchoolInfoRefId] AS [SchoolInfoKey]
	, [Name] AS [ValueName]
    , [PercentageMinimum]
    , [PercentageMaximum]
    , [PercentagePassingGrade]
    , [NumericPrecision]
    , [NumericScale]
    , [NumericLow]
    , [NumericHigh]
    , [NumericPassingGrade]
    , [NarrativeMaximumSize]
    , [Narrative]    
FROM
OPENROWSET(
BULK 'samples/sif/MarkValueInfo/MarkValueInfo/Snapshot/MarkValueInfo/*',
DATA_SOURCE ='sif_eds',
FORMAT='PARQUET'
) 
WITH (
    [RefId] VARCHAR(36)  ,	
    [SchoolInfoRefId] VARCHAR(36)  ,	
    [Name] VARCHAR(255)  ,	
    [PercentageMinimum] FLOAT  ,	
    [PercentageMaximum] FLOAT  ,	
    [PercentagePassingGrade] FLOAT  ,	
    [NumericPrecision] INT  ,	
    [NumericScale] INT  ,	
    [NumericLow] INT ,	
    [NumericHigh] INT  ,	
    [NumericPassingGrade] INT  ,	
    [Narrative] VARCHAR(255)  ,	
    [NarrativeMaximumSize] INT  
)
AS [result]
